page.title: 12THE VILLAGE OF BURITON
page.content: {Employment:}Agriculture and horticulture are the main local forms of employment but most workers commute to Petersfield, Portsmouth and London. {Government:}East Hampshire District Council are the Planning Authority, Hampshire County Council are the Rating Authority, Southern Water are responsible for sewage disposal and Mid Southern Water supply the drinking water. {Health:}Doctors attend from practices in Petersfield. {Housing: About half of the houses are owner occupied, and have been bought by fairly wealthy retired people eg ex Service Officers, company directors. Property values are high and few young people move to the village. Most young people live on the council estate. New houses have been built between High Street and Bones Lane and along the Petersfield Road.
